description: Boddole Zer appeared in the movie http://anidb.net/a996 [The Super Dimension Fortress Macross: Do You Remember Love?] as a cyborg Zentradi leader who was fused with a massive combat mobile fortress that had a 120,000 cycle history of space battles. In the movie, Boddole Zer was also in command of a male Zentradi fleet which had been at war with the female Meltlandi for hundreds of thousands of years. He orders the destruction of Earth after his fleet discovers a rebuilt Meltlandi ship on the planet before the beginning of the film. After both the Zentradi and the Meltlandi become "cultured" by an ancient Protoculture song and join the surviving humans, Boddole Zer and his fortress are attacked by the combined forces of both fleets and the http://anidb.net/ch21733 [SDF-1 Macross]. Boddole Zer himself is destroyed by http://anidb.net/ch7654 [Ichijou Hikaru] flying a VF-1 Valkyrie variable fighter at the end of the film.Source: wiki
name: Gol Boddole Zer
